The video was filmed in 2016 at the TPC: which stands for Launch Directional Robot Intelligent Circuitry.
LDRIC was developed by Golf Laboratories: a robotics company that specializes in testing new golf club designs.
The robot has a powerful swing: capable of hitting a ball up to 130 mph, and can replicate the swing of any golfer.
According to NPR: it took LDRIC five attempts to sink the hole-in-one, indicating that the feat was not easily achieved.
